Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class GamesHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.GamesHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientConnectionListener
public class GamesHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientConnectionListener
handles the currently active games and connection related aspects of a game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GamesHandler()
    creates a new games handler

    • removeGame

      public void removeGame​(java.lang.String gameId, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> playersId)
      removes the game when an error occurred in the setup phase
      Parameters:
      gameId - represents the id of the game to remove
      playersId - contains the id of the players in the selected game

      connection - represents the client's socket connection

    • manageLobby

      public void manageLobby​(java.lang.String nickname, boolean gameHost, int playersNumber, java.lang.String socketID)
      manages the creation of a new game and the addition of a player to an existing game
      Parameters:
      nickname - represents the client's nickname
      gameHost - indicates if the player wants to create a new jame or join an existing one
      playersNumber - represents the number of players associates to the new game (0 if the player wants to join a game)
      socketID - represents the client's socket id

    • manageDisconnection

      public void manageDisconnection​(java.lang.String nickname, java.lang.String socketId)
      removes a player from the lobby
      Parameters:
      nickname - represents the nickname of the removed player
      socketId - represents the socket's id

    • manageReconnection

      public void manageReconnection​(java.lang.String nickname, java.lang.String socketID)
      manages the reconnection of a player to a game he previously left
      Parameters:
      nickname - represents the reconnecting player's nickname
      socketID - represents the client's socket connection
